Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.model.game.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a player in the game, encapsulating properties such as nickname, credits, personal game board, color, and notifier for client communication. Manages player-specific actions and state, including credit management, early landing status, and interactions with the game client through notifications. Implements Serializable to allow the player's state to be serialized when needed.
See Also:

    • Player

      public Player(String nickname, ShipBoard personalBoard, PlayerColor playerColor)
      Constructs a Player instance with the specified nickname, personal game board, and player color.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      personalBoard - the player's personal game board
      playerColor - the color representing the player

      public PlayerColor getPlayerColor()
      Retrieves the color associated with the player.
      Returns:
      the player's color as a PlayerColor enumeration value.

    • setGameClientNotifier

      public void setGameClientNotifier(GameClientNotifier gameClientNotifier)
      Sets the GameClientNotifier instance for this player.
      Parameters:
      gameClientNotifier - The GameClientNotifier responsible for handling client notifications associated with this player.

    • getNickname

      public String getNickname()
      Retrieves the nickname associated with this object.
      Returns:
      the nickname as a String

    • addCredits

      public void addCredits(int number)
      Updates the player's owned credits by adding the specified amount. Notifies all connected clients about the updated credits for the player.
      Parameters:
      number - The number of credits to add to the player's owned credits.

    • getPersonalBoard

      public ShipBoard getPersonalBoard()
      Retrieves the personal board associated with the player.
      Returns:
      the ShipBoard object representing the player's personal board.

    • getPersonalBoardAsMatrix

      public Component[][] getPersonalBoardAsMatrix()
      Retrieves the personal board represented as a matrix of components.
      Returns:
      A two-dimensional array of Component objects representing the current state of the personal board.

    • getOwnedCredits

      public int getOwnedCredits()
      Retrieves the number of credits owned by the player.
      Returns:
      the number of credits currently owned by the player

    • setOwnedCredits

      public void setOwnedCredits(int ownedCredits)
      Sets the number of credits owned by the player.
      Parameters:
      ownedCredits - the number of credits to be set as owned by the player

    • isEarlyLanded

      public boolean isEarlyLanded()
      Checks whether the player has landed early.
      Returns:
      true if the player has landed early, false otherwise.

    • setEarlyLanded

      public void setEarlyLanded(boolean isEarlyLanded)
      Sets the early landed status for the player.
      Parameters:
      isEarlyLanded - a boolean indicating whether the player has landed early
